tokens.resolved_gloss: the new moon; by implication, a month

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, an appointment, i.e. a fixed time or season; specifically, a festival; conventionally a year; by implication, an assembly (as convened for a definite purpose); technically the congregation; by extension, the place of meeting; also a signal (as appointed beforehand)
tokens.translation: properly, an appointment, i.e. a fixed time or season; specifically, a festival; conventionally a year; by implication, an assembly (as convened for a definite purpose); technically the congregation; by extension, the place of meeting; also a signal (as appointed beforehand)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
